about.title: About Me
about.introduction:
Hi! I'm a full-stack web developer and product designer with over 15 years of experience in content production. Throughout my career, I've led a wide range of projects and collaborated with teams and clients from around the world, especially in the technology and events sectors.

My passion for interactivity and technology led me to naturally transition into digital design and web development. What drives me is creating digital products that go beyond functionality—products that are truly accessible, engaging, and centered on real human needs.
about.introductionNew: Hi! I'm a full-stack developer and product designer, currently transitioning from over 15 years in audiovisual and multimedia production into the world of digital products. Since 2023, I've been applying my background in creativity, storytelling, and large-scale project delivery to web development and UX/UI design. I've collaborated with teams and clients worldwide, especially in the technology and events sectors. What drives me today is creating digital solutions that combine functionality with thoughtful design—products that are accessible, intuitive, and centered on real human needs.
